{ CALL PKG_SCHEDULE.PROC_GET_GUGUN( #{ region_id_sido, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR } , #{ result, mode=OUT, jdbcType=CURSOR, javaType=ResultSet, resultMap=regionList }) }
